description: As we mark the 75th anniversary of the World War II Victory in Europe, Tom Brokaw reflects on the bravery and sacrifices of the Greatest Generation. We should find inspiration in their courage as we face another global challenge, he says.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Austria tests travelers for coronavirus at airports to prevent spread
description: Travelers landing in Austria are now given a test for coronavirus and are either free to enter or facing a 14-day quarantine depending on their results. It’s a small step towards getting the nation back to work and a possible example for other countries.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: New coronavirus antigen test gets FDA emergency authorization
description: The FDA issued emergency use authorization for a new coronavirus test to detect antigens, or fragments of virus proteins, with much faster results than current diagnostic tests in use. In Hong Kong, researchers saw promising results using three antiviral drug…
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: 3 top health officials self-isolate after coronavirus cases inside White House
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci is following a “modified” quarantine, while CDC Director Robert Redfield and FDA Director Stephen Hahn are isolating at home for two weeks. This weekend some Secret Service agents and White House employees were seen wearing masks.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: California Gov. Newsom: COVID-19 community spread ‘started in a nail salon’
description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom announced that community spread of coronavirus started at a nail salon. The governor went on to say "We need to maintain our vigilance, maintain our distance."
source.name: NBC News

author: David K. Li
title: Baseball in a pandemic: 90 feet between bases, 6 feet between players
description: Baseball in a pandemic: 90 feet between bases, 6 feet between players
content: 1/ We have a comprehensive plan in place to play baseball this summer that not only meets, but goes above and beyond the current recommended social distancing guidelines. The plan includes the attached diagram, which displays how we will adhere to the guideli… [+7856 chars]
source.name: NBC News
